content.rendered:
Mission Based Constellations For

Drone Service Providers.

Overcome the challenges of scale, distance, and economic efficiency in other solutions using autonomous fixed-wing drones that can fly autonomously Beyond Visual Line of Sight to perform different missions .

Get a quote

Scroll down

What Client Say

In ATLAN Space we develop Artificial Intelligence to enable drone manufacturers and service providers to build their own mission-based autonomous.

Won Soo-Yun Founder ABC

In ATLAN Space we develop Artificial Intelligence to enable drone manufacturers and service providers to build their own mission-based autonomous.

Won Soo-Yun Founder ABC

In ATLAN Space we develop Artificial Intelligence to enable drone manufacturers and service providers to build their own mission-based autonomous.

Won Soo-Yun Founder ABC

In ATLAN Space we develop Artificial Intelligence to enable drone manufacturers and service providers to build their own mission-based autonomous.

Won Soo-Yun Founder ABC

What We Provide

ATLAN Geo

Simplify your Land-Surveying missions.

ATLAN GEO are high-endurance autonomous drones, capable of flying beyond the horizon to deliver perfectly exploitable results in a fraction of the time at a lower cost.

Get A Quote
ATLAN Insight

Understand your Fisheries Dynamics.

ATLAN Insight are high endurance autonomous drones capable of flying beyond the horizon to detect, identify and track suspicious activities in real-time, allowing our customers to cost-efficiently make sensitive decisions and protect their marine biodiversity.

Get A Quote
ATLAN Core

Build your Mission Based Constellations.

Artificial Intelligence that you can embed in your own drones to scale-up the manufacturing process and automate your UAV flights.

Get A Quote
Coming soon

Our Core Value

In ATLAN Space we develop Artificial Intelligence to enable drone manufacturers and service providers to build their own mission-based autonomous constellations of UAVs.
The patented technology uses long-endurance and low-altitude drones to fly BVLOS and carry out different types of information acquisition missions over large geographical areas, such as the detection of anomalies and environmental risks in real-time, mapping, and infrastructure inspection.

UAV Applications

Agriculture
Infrastructure and disaster assessment
Land Surveying and GIS
Oil and Gas
Mining and Exploration
Environment & humanitarian
Cargo Delivery
Ocean monitoring

Award winning software

Get in touch with us

Contact ATLAN Space to :

  • Discuss your business’s challenges and needs
  • Learn more about the cutting-edge technology we offer
  • Know the available drone models & get a quote

    privacy policy*

    Featured in

    As a cutting-edge technology company that develops UAV software, our innovative solutions have been featured in numerous media outlets, from local news stations to prestigious weekly journals.

    Whats’s going on with ATLAN Space?

    ATLAN Insight

    ATLAN Insight estimates the required energy for the drone to get the job done using the calibration procedure at the start of every mission. Moreover, it keeps tabs on energy requirements in real-time during the flight...
    Read More

    Le drone ATLAN Geo

    ATLAN Geo est un drone VTOL à voilure fixe muni d’Intelligence Artificielle qui simplifie et accélère l’exécution des missions de levés topographiques, capture et classifie efficacement les données...
    Read More

    Multi-base RTK+PPK

    ATLAN GEO features 2 multi-band GPS receivers with different antennas for real time accuracy in most use cases. It can be combined with static GPS data for increased centimeter level accuracy. You can make the most of...
    Read More

    Stay up to date

    Subscribe to newsletter for latest news & updates.
